Title: Alexander the Great Enthroned at Persepolis
Medium: ink and pigments on light brown paper with later outer margins in various colors
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.613 depicts Alexander the Great enthroned at Persepolis. The illustration is by Bim Gujarati.
Keywords: Islamic; Mughal; Persian; Book; Codex; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Pakistan; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Nizami Ganjavi (Azerbaijani, died 605 AH/AD 1209)
